Package org.apache.aries.typedevent.remote.spi

@Export @Version("0.0.1") package org.apache.aries.typedevent.remote.spi
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LocalEventConsumerManager
    A simple helper class used to manage the registrations of UntypedEventHandler services in the local service registry, used to feed events into the remote events implementation.
